name: BULLETLINE (itch)
description:
BULLETLINE

Bulletline is a top-down action shooter set in the cyberpunk future of today. You play as Anna, 20, a woman from Mega-Rapla who's town has been overrun by monsters. 

The police and army are in deep deep DEEP sh- to try and control the situation. 

You can't go home to chill, you must escape the city. 

Only grandma can save you.

Install instructions:

Download APK to your phone.

Find the file on your phone

Install

Find the app and play!

Report any issues in the comments!
